name: 12 Angry Hours
description:
12 Angry Hours is an action roguelite/shoot'em up.
You will have to overcome 12 waves of opponents ready to do anything to beat the clock. Become the master of each of the available characters to reach the end of the timer!

A Race Against Time



Play as a clock and let the rhythm of your weapons carry you along.
Stay ahead of your enemies by upgrading your weapons and features, use the activable items at the right time to dominate your enemies!

No Spare Time


12 Angry Hours games are fast-paced, frantic, and no-nonsense. Collect gears from your enemies' remains to unlock new content and expand your arsenal!
